duck: Accordance is a Bible study program for Apple Macintosh and iPhone developed by OakTree Software, Inc. Reviewers consider it a premium program.

wiki.text:
{{Infobox Software |name = Accordance |logo = |screenshot = |caption =
|developer = OakTree Software, Inc. |latest_release_version = 10.x
|latest_release_date = August 2012 |operating_system = System 7 to Mac OS X, iOS
|genre = Digital library, Bible study |license = Proprietary |website =
[http://www.accordancebible.com www.accordancebible.com] }} 'Accordance' is a
Bible study program for Apple Macintosh and iPhone developed by OakTree
Software, Inc.<ref name=oaktree/> Reviewers consider it a premium
program.<ref></ref>

As well as a standalone program, it is the base software packaged by Zondervan
in their Bible Study suites for Macintosh.<ref>[http://www.zondervan.com/Cultures/en-
US/Search/Search.htm?SC=%22Zondervan+Reference+Series+for+Macintosh&QueryString-
Site=Zondervan Bible Study suites for Macintosh], Zondervan</ref> Although
Accordance has been written exclusively for the Mac OS and iOS, it also runs on
PCs using the Basilisk II emulator. In 2013 Oak Tree Software will release a
Windows version.

The program is used for both private and academic study. The translators of the
Holman Christian Standard Bible, completed in 2004, used it for word studies,
comparisons and instant searches. Commenting on the use of Accordance, the
HCSB's editor Ed Blum said, "This project used far more computerization than
anyone else has ever been able to do."<ref></ref>
wiki.title: accordance
